comments:
I have a pair of master / slave reports that have expression evaluation errors when run with frameset (e.g., http://...../frameset?_report=...) but not run e.g., http://...../run?_report=...).  A copy of the error stack trace is provided at the end of this description.

The expressions employ aggregate functions (e.g., Total.max(), Total.min(), Total.sum()).  The datasets these expression operate over data results which may be empty. It is when the result sets are empty that the errors are reported.  

Further, the reports are designed not to display the area containing the expressions when there is no data.

Again, the report work correctly when using run but not frameset.  Obviously, I want the added functionality in the frameset display.

I am hoping to attach the report designs to this bug report.  However, it is not immediately obvious how to do so.

- Jim

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following items have errors: 


Data (id = 299): 
+ There are errors evaluating script "row["LastProcessed"]".
